column5: If you want to study a general project management masterâ€™s degree with an IT flavour, this is the course for you. It offers a range of project management skills useful in many subject areas, plus skills that are particularly useful in IT project management. You also study IT-related management skills within information systems and e-commerce.There are two routes you can choose from to gain an MSc IT Project Management:
